title: Statusline integration
description: Add statusline component integration for popular statusline plugins (lualine, etc.) to display current track info, playback state, and controls.

title: Implement MusicKit to replace AppleScript
description: Replace the AppleScript-based Apple Music backend with MusicKit framework for improved performance, reliability, and access to richer APIs.

title: Implement playlist management
description: Create, delete, rename playlists. Add, remove, and reorder tracks within playlists.

title: Add queue navigation and controls
description: Add ability to view, navigate, add to, and remove from the playback queue.

title: Add repeat-mode control
description: Add ability to toggle and control repeat mode (off, one, all) for playback.

title: Implement Tidal backend
description: Add Tidal streaming service as a backend option, implementing the backend interface for playback control, library access, and queue management.
